title: Encore casino says online gambling bill is a ‘bad bet’ for Mass.

title: What the Patriots are saying about possibly facing Bengals QB Joe Burrow
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Morning Sports Update Burrow has been a full participant at practice this week, putting him in line to play in Sunday's game against the Patriots.
Joe Burrow has spent the last eight games on the sideline for the Bengals.
(AP Photo/Kareem Elgazzar) By Conor Roche November 21, 2025 | 10:52 AM 5 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: BPD commissioner won’t face state review, despite push from Karen Read’s attorney
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News Alan Jackson had called for Commissioner Michael Cox to face a disciplinary review over his comments about a witness from Read’s case.
John Tlumacki/Boston Globe Staff, File By Abby Patkin November 21, 2025 | 10:50 AM 3 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

Boston Police Commissioner Michael Cox won’t face a disciplinary review over his comments on the Karen Read case, the state’s police oversight board said Thursday, responding to a call to action from Read attorney Alan JacksonAs head of the city’s police department, Cox “is a civilian executive, not a sworn law enforcement officer,” wrote Enrique A.

title: Hampton Beach Casino redevelopment clears major hurdle
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News The Planning Board signed off on the multi-million-dollar plan to modernize and more than double the size of the ocean-front venue.
A rendering of the planned Hampton Beach Casino in New Hampshire.
PCA Architects/Lupoli Companies ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: The most family-friendly ski resort in the East is in Vermont, according to Ski magazine
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Travel The standout resort is part of the publication's Resort Guide 2026.
A family snowshoeing at Smugglers' Notch in Vermont.

Smugglers' Notch By Kristi Palma November 21, 2025 | 10:13 AM 1 minute to read Skiing together is a great bonding event for families, according to Ski magazine, and the ultimate family ski destination is in Vermont.

title: Embracing a quieter life, Tim Thomas reflects on his tenure with the Bruins
author: Conor Ryan

title: Mass. man reports being shot with pellet gun while golfing
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The man was golfing at the Leo J.
Martin Golf Course in Weston when he was hit in the side with a pellet from a gun.
The man told Weston police that he was hit with the pellet while golfing at the Leo J.

title: Cam Newton doubles down on ‘fool’s gold’ Patriots comment, says he’s a ‘Drake Maye fan’
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "I'm a Drake Maye fan.
But Drake Maye, you still have to prove yourself in a situation where I do not think that the AFC goes through New England.
" Cam Newton's recent comments have caused a stir for Patriots fans.
